Package de.esoco.lib.collection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReferenceCacheMap.MappedReference<K,V>
    The common interface for mapped references.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractObservableCollection<T,C extends java.util.Collection<T>,E extends CollectionEvent<T,C>>
    A base class for collection implementations that can be observed for changes.
    ByteArray
    A dynamic array of bytes that can grow and shrink to hold an arbitrary number of byte values.
    CacheMap<K,V>
    A subclass of linked hash map that implements a cache of a fixed size.
    CollectionEvent<E,C extends java.util.Collection<E>>
    An element event subclass that contains informations related to collection modifications.
    IntArray
    A dynamic array of integers that can grow and shrink to hold an arbitrary number of int values.
    IterableWrapper<T>
    A simple wrapper around an Iterable instance.
    ListEvent<E>
    A collection event subclass that provides access to the index of the list position that is affected by the index.
    MapEvent<K,V>
    An element event subclass that contains informations related to map modifications.
    ObservableCollection<E>
    A collection implementation that can be used to observe arbitrary collections for changes.
    ObservableList<E>
    A list implementation that can be observed for changes.
    ObservableMap<K,V>
    A map implementation that can be used to observe arbitrary map objects for changes.
    ObservableSet<E>
    A set implementation that can be used to observe arbitrary set instances for changes.
    ReferenceCacheMap<K,V>
    A specialized cache map that manages references to the contained values with a ReferenceQueue.
    ReferenceCacheMap.MappedSoftReference<K,V>
    A SoftReference subclass for mappings that also contains the key of the mapped value.
    ReferenceCacheMap.MappedWeakReference<K,V>
    A WeakReference subclass for mappings that also contains the key of the mapped value.
